meanings.definition: Happening or done at the right time; timely.
meanings.sent1: The timeous arrival of the ambulance saved the injured man's life.
meanings.sent2: It is important to be timeous when submitting your assignments.
meanings.sent3: The timeous squirrel gathered nuts before the winter, avoiding hunger.
meanings.sent4: Her timeous decision to leave before the storm saved her from getting drenched.
meanings.sent5: The timeous reminder on his phone prevented him from missing the meeting.

meanings.sent1: The timeous response from the fire department prevented a disaster.
meanings.sent2: She is known for being timeous in her daily routines.
meanings.sent3: The timeous cat always showed up for dinner right on time.
meanings.sent4: His timeous actions in the emergency situation were commendable.
meanings.sent5: The timeous bus arrival ensured she reached work early.
